long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_4:
Returns Mute Tab option from Chrome 71 to nowadays.

Mute / Unmute Tab
Control the sound on every page. Extension will mute any media on a page, but will not stop it. 

Make your personal silent mode, and don't waste time for searching mute button or volume line.

Individually Mute or Unmute tabs temporarily using context menu option. Click right mouse button and chose "Mute tab", another way
interacting with the extension icon.

Mute Tab free no ads extension chrome extension. All permissions are required to proper muting tabs.

Mute Tab is a browser extension that helps you quickly mute all tabs with just one button (click).
Toolbar button serves as an ON|OFF switch, once pressed, the icon will change accordingly (color and shape). Please note that if you want to unmute just one tab, simply right-click on a tab and then click on the "Unmute Tab" item.

Note 1: if you manually unmute a tab, the addon will NOT change it, even if you click on the toolbar icon.
long.en,en_AU,en_US:
Mute / Unmute Tab
Control the sound on every page with ease. This extension will mute any media playing on a page without stopping it.

Create your personal silent mode and save time by not having to search for the mute button or volume control.

Individually mute or unmute tabs temporarily using the context menu option. Simply right-click on a tab and choose "Mute Tab." Alternatively, you can interact with the extension icon to achieve the same result.

Mute Tab is a free, ad-free Chrome extension designed for seamless muting of tabs. All necessary permissions are required for proper functionality.

Features:
Quick Muting: Mute all tabs with just one click.
ON|OFF Switch: The toolbar button acts as a switch; once pressed, the icon changes its color and shape to indicate its status.
Individual Control: If you want to unmute a specific tab, right-click on the tab and select "Unmute Tab."

Note 1: If you manually unmute a tab, the extension will not override your setting, even if you click on the toolbar icon.

This extension is perfect for managing audio across multiple tabs effortlessly, ensuring a more pleasant and controlled browsing experience.

Please read:
Our extension partners with an affiliate network exclusively for link affiliation purposes.

We do not collect or store any of your search queries, nor do we profit from them. Our earnings are solely from sales made through affiliate link clicks.
The ads from this partnership do not interfere with any third-party websites, in-app ads, or native advertising.
